head.title: Divide {{FileFormatUp}} documents in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, easily break down {{FileFormatUp}} files into separate documents. Work with PDFs, Word files, Excel sheets, PowerPoint presentations, Visio diagrams, images, archives, and more.

header.title: Divide {{FileFormatUp}} files
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} adds powerful document manipulation features to {{EnvNameShort}} applications. Seamlessly split {{FileFormatUp}} files and process a variety of widely used formats.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Overview of {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a robust document management library supporting 50+ formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. It enables file merging, splitting, page extraction, rearrangement, swapping, and deletion, simplifying document handling within your applications.

more_features.title: Comprehensive document handling
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides an extensive toolkit for modifying over 50 widely used document formats with ease.

feature_1.title: Merge different file types
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, spreadsheets, slideshows, Visio diagrams, images, and compressed archives. Adjust merging settings to suit your needs.

feature_2.title: Customize document structure
feature_2.content: Modify document layout by reordering, swapping, or removing pages as needed.

feature_3.title: Modify page orientation
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or change between portrait and landscape formats.

feature_4.title: Extract specific pages
feature_4.content: Select one or multiple pages and save them as a separate document in your preferred location.

formats.title: Divide multiple file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 document types, enabling fast and flexible modifications.

operations.title: Core functionalities
operations.description: Discover the advanced features of our document processing library.

examples.comment_2: Set the destination path for the output file

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) allows you to split {{FileFormatUp}} documents, extracting selected pages into a new file. Integrate efficient document management into your {{EnvName}} applications.
content.step_1: Provide the file path of the original {{FileFormatUp}} document.
content.step_2: Set the location where the split document will be saved.
content.step_3: Define settings to control the split operation.
content.step_4: Process the file and save the results.

code_1.title: Extract even-numbered pages from {{FileFormatUp}} document
code_1.content: This sample demonstrates how to split a {{FileFormatUp}} document and save only even-numbered pages as a new file.
code_1.comment_3: Get the total number of pages
code_1.comment_4: Configure the split operation for even pages
code_1.comment_5: Perform the split and save the new file
